io.proximax.dfms.http.repos

Class DriveHttp

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.proximax.dfms.http.HttpRepository<StorageApi>
      • io.proximax.dfms.http.repos.DriveHttp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DriveRepository

    public class DriveHttp
extends HttpRepository<StorageApi>
implements DriveRepository
    Drive repository implementation using HTTP protocol

      • copy

        public io.reactivex.Completable copy(Cid id,
                                     java.lang.String sourcePath,
                                     java.lang.String destinationPath)
        Description copied from interface: DriveRepository

        copies file in a specific Drive from one path to another.

        NOTE: Does not do actual copy, only copies reference(a.k.a SymLink). That way file is not duplicated on a disk, but accessible from different paths.

        Specified by:
        copy in interface DriveRepository
        Parameters:
        id - CID of the contract
        sourcePath - path to copy form
        destinationPath - path to copy to
        Returns:
        confirmation that request was fulfilled
